advancedchat.config.general.info.timefor:
How time is displayed if §6Show Time§r is enabled for both the §9Chat HUD§r and the §aChat Log§r. 
See the §6SimpleDateFormat§r class for the format
advancedchat.config.general.info.timetex: How the §6text§r surrounding the §6time§r is formatted
advancedchat.config.general.info.showtim: Whether or not the time is §6displayed alongside chat messages§r
advancedchat.config.general.info.timecol: What color the §6time§r will display as
advancedchat.config.general.info.clearon:
Whether or not chat messages are kept upon §6disconnecting from servers§r or §6quitting from a singleplayer world§r 
Chat messages are §cnot kept§r upon §6quitting the game§r, regardless of this setting
advancedchat.config.general.info.chatsta: Whether or not stacked messages are §6shown again as new messages§r

How many previous lines are checked for §6stacking duplicate messages§r 
Set to §60§r to disable stacking duplicate messages
advancedchat.config.general.info.chathea: Whether or not the §6head of the message sender§r displays beside their message
advancedchat.config.general.info.message:
The §6regular expression§r used to detect the head used for chat heads 
§cDon't mess with this unless you §c§oreally §cunderstand what you're working with!
advancedchat.config.general.info.filterp:
Filter's out §9swear words§r and replaces them with *'s.

To use your own swear word list have each line be a swear word
in a file in §7~minecraft/config/advancedchat/swear_words.txt
advancedchat.config.chatscreen.info.pers: Whether or not messages that are §6typed but not sent§r are kept after closing the §9Chat Box
advancedchat.config.chatscreen.info.more: Whether or not messages that are §6over the 256 character limit§r are broken into multiple chat messages
advancedchat.config.chatscreen.info.colo: Changes color of the §6chat box§r and buttons nearby.
